item.log: Add the markup column to namedobject
item.sql: ALTER TABLE namedobject ADD markup CLOB;

item.log: Add the files column to namedobject
item.sql: ALTER TABLE namedobject ADD files CLOB;

item.sql: ALTER TABLE chapter ADD goalsmarkup CLOB;
